title: About
text:
Jom Research is a dedicated academic consultancy platform owned by TMH Research Kits Resources (SSM registration no: 202303206919/ CT0125644-X), based in Malaysia. Jom Research was established with the specific purpose of offering easily accessible and high-quality webinars focused on research and statistical analysis.
What truly distinguishes Jom Research is our commitment to providing a comprehensive and seamless learning journey. Our meticulously designed webinars ensure that every participant, from those just starting their exploration to seasoned researchers seeking advanced insights, can progress effectively. We cover a full spectrum of concepts, starting from the foundational basics and advancing smoothly to the most sophisticated topics and cutting-edge techniques in research and statistical analysis.
At the heart of Jom Research’s mission is the idea of democratizing education through quality and accessibility. We recognize that essential learning should be available to learners of all levels, and we achieve this by offering valuable educational content that caters to a diverse audience and supports continuous professional development.
Do join our webinars and elevate your research skills!

title: Correlation and regression analysis using SPSS & jamovi
text:
The material for this webinar is available for purchase:

Title: Correlation and regression analysis using SPSS & jamovi
Language: English
Price: RM70 (recording, slides, and dummy data)
Prerequisite: Basic knowledge of SPSS and jamovi, for those without the basics, you can either:

Buy our webinars’ recording - An introduction to SPSS & jamovi - RM30
Or watch some introductory videos on SPSS & jamovi on YouTube

Content:

Spearman correlation
Pearson correlation
Simple & multiple linear regression
Simple & multiple logistic regression
Variable selection process
Related concepts such as interaction, outliers, and multicollinearity
Hands-on using SPSS and jamovi

title: Jom Research
text:
We help postgraduate students, early‑career researchers, and junior lecturers by providing webinars and webinar recordings on statistical analysis and research.
Check out our future webinars and webinar recordings!

title: Webinars
text:
Due to an ongoing company restructuring, live webinars are temporarily suspended. Recorded webinar sessions remain available for purchase.
Thank you for your understanding, we plan to resume live webinars once the reorganisation is complete.
